detailedFeatures.title: Complete Product Features of Z-Image
detailedFeatures.subtitle: Discover all the powerful capabilities that make Z-Image the leading AI image generation foundation model with Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer
detailedFeatures.ctaNote: No registration required ‚Ä¢ Start creating in seconds

consistency.title: Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer Architecture
consistency.description: Z-Image features a revolutionary single-stream diffusion transformer architecture with 6B parameters. This efficient design enables superior performance across all image generation tasks, providing better processing efficiency compared to multi-stream models while maintaining state-of-the-art quality. The foundation model architecture unlocks the full potential for community-driven fine-tuning and custom development.

speed.title: Z-Image-Turbo: 8 NFEs Ultra-Fast Inference
speed.description: Z-Image-Turbo is a distilled version that matches or exceeds leading competitors with only 8 NFEs (Number of Function Evaluations). It offers sub-second inference latency on enterprise-grade H800 GPUs and fits comfortably within 16G VRAM consumer devices. Z-Image-Turbo excels in photorealistic image generation, bilingual text rendering (English & Chinese), and robust instruction adherence.

conversational.title: Bilingual Text Rendering (English & Chinese)
conversational.description: Z-Image-Turbo excels in bilingual text rendering, supporting both English and Chinese text generation with perfect accuracy. This makes Z-Image ideal for global applications, enabling users worldwide to generate images with accurate text in their preferred language. The robust instruction adherence ensures precise text rendering in complex scenes.

iterative.title: Z-Image-Edit: Advanced Image Editing
iterative.description: Z-Image-Edit is a variant fine-tuned on Z-Image specifically for image editing tasks. It supports creative image-to-image generation with impressive instruction-following capabilities, allowing for precise edits based on natural language prompts. Perfect for refining existing images and applying targeted modifications while maintaining visual coherence.

fusion.title: Intelligent Image Fusion
fusion.description: Blend two images seamlessly with nano banana AI Image Editor's intelligent fusion technology. Create unique compositions with precise control over style transfer, object placement, and artistic effects. Nano banana AI fusion maintains visual coherence while allowing unlimited creative possibilities for combining images.

quality.title: #1 Open-Source Model Performance
quality.description: Z-Image-Turbo ranked 8th overall on the Artificial Analysis Text-to-Image Leaderboard, making it the #1 open-source model! It achieves state-of-the-art results among open-source models and shows highly competitive performance against leading proprietary models. According to Elo-based Human Preference Evaluation on Alibaba AI Arena, Z-Image-Turbo also achieves state-of-the-art results among open-source models.

interactive.title: Enhanced Interactive Experience
interactive.description: Experience an intuitive interface with nano banana AI Image Editor featuring real-time preview, drag-and-drop support, and seamless workflow. The interactive design makes advanced image editing as simple as having a conversation, with instant feedback and smooth user experience throughout your creative process.

resolution.title: High-Resolution Watermark-Free Images
resolution.description: Generate professional, watermark-free images at 1024√ó1024 resolution with nano banana AI Image Editor. All outputs are high-quality, ready for immediate commercial use without watermarks or restrictions. Perfect for professional projects requiring pristine image quality and commercial licensing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Z-Image and Z-Image Studio

items.question: What is Z-Image?
items.answer: Z-Image is a powerful 6B-parameter AI image generation foundation model with Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer architecture. It features three variants: Z-Image-Turbo (8 NFEs, sub-second inference), Z-Image-Base (foundation model), and Z-Image-Edit (image editing variant). Z-Image-Turbo ranked 8th overall on Artificial Analysis Text-to-Image Leaderboard, making it the #1 open-source model.

items.question: How fast is Z-Image-Turbo?
items.answer: Z-Image-Turbo achieves sub-second inference latency on enterprise-grade H800 GPUs with only 8 NFEs (Number of Function Evaluations). It fits comfortably within 16G VRAM consumer devices, making it one of the fastest open-source image generation models available.

items.question: What makes Z-Image different from other AI image models?
items.answer: Z-Image features a revolutionary Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer architecture with 6B parameters. Z-Image-Turbo excels in photorealistic image generation, bilingual text rendering (English & Chinese), and robust instruction adherence. It's the #1 open-source model on the Artificial Analysis Leaderboard.

items.question: What is Z-Image Studio?
items.answer: Z-Image Studio is a web-based platform that provides easy access to Z-Image models. It offers a user-friendly interface for generating high-quality images using Z-Image-Turbo, Z-Image-Base, and Z-Image-Edit variants, optimized and deployed by z-image.ai.

items.question: Can Z-Image generate images with text?
items.answer: Yes! Z-Image-Turbo excels in bilingual text rendering, supporting both English and Chinese text generation with perfect accuracy. This makes Z-Image ideal for global applications requiring accurate text rendering in images.

items.question: What image resolution does Z-Image support?
items.answer: Z-Image supports high-resolution image generation at 1024√ó1024 pixels. The models are optimized for professional-quality output suitable for commercial use, e-commerce, advertising, and social media applications.

items.question: Can I use Z-Image for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! Z-Image is released under Apache-2.0 license, which allows commercial use. Images generated with Z-Image are commercial-ready and optimized for professional applications including e-commerce, advertising, and marketing materials.

items.question: What is the difference between Z-Image-Turbo, Z-Image-Base, and Z-Image-Edit?
items.answer: Z-Image-Turbo is a distilled version with 8 NFEs for ultra-fast inference. Z-Image-Base is the non-distilled foundation model for fine-tuning. Z-Image-Edit is fine-tuned specifically for image editing tasks with impressive instruction-following capabilities.

items.question: How does Z-Image achieve such fast inference?
items.answer: Z-Image-Turbo uses advanced distillation techniques (Decoupled-DMD and DMDR) to reduce inference steps to just 8 NFEs while maintaining state-of-the-art quality. The Single-Stream Diffusion Transformer architecture also contributes to efficient processing.

items.question: Where can I find Z-Image models and documentation?
items.answer: Z-Image is available on GitHub (github.com/Tongyi-MAI/Z-Image), Hugging Face, and ModelScope. The official repository includes technical reports, inference examples, and comprehensive documentation for getting started with Z-Image models.
